description: LifecycleHook represents a single instance of a lifecycle hook

name.description: Name defines a unique name for the lifcycle hook. The name should be unique and descriptive, ideally 1-3 words, in CamelCase or it may be namespaced, eg. foo.example.com/CamelCase. Names must be unique and should only be managed by a single entity.

owner.description: Owner defines the owner of the lifecycle hook. This should be descriptive enough so that users can identify who/what is responsible for blocking the lifecycle. This could be the name of a controller (e.g. clusteroperator/etcd) or an administrator managing the hook.
